desc: We at APORIA provide the GSC (Green Smart & Clean) solutions for your home, office, and travel. APORIA SHOP is a multi-channel shop for our vendors such as APORIA, GreenHandleUS, AdorablePinkPeri & Japandi. We share our profits to give back to the communities in need & environmental services.

layout.text: Free Shipping over $15 in the U.S.

Welcome to APORIASHOP
We at APORIA specialize in Green, Clean, and Smart solutions while giving back to green initiatives. Located in San Francisco, we match everything Amazon does for you, with more friendliness and zero-waste in mind
